item.title: MERRY CHRISTMAS! EKC 25.2 CHRISTMAS EDITION IS THE LATEST VERSION. STREAMS ARE VERY GOOD RIGHT NOW FOR SHOWS AND MOVIES. ONLY GLITCH IS WHEN YOU STOP PLAYBACK, IT LIKES TO BEGIN PLAYING AGAIN. SIMPLY CLICK OUT OF THE SECOND FEED WHEN YOU STOP. BACKUP OPTIONS ARE UNDER MOVIES AND SHOWS. THE NEW SOURCE/SCRPAER SEEMS TO BE MUCH QUICKER WITH THIS NEW SET UP.
